short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read wikipedia snippets when browsing the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Qwiki displays Wikipedia snippets on your new tab page and, optionally, on any other web page. For some languages you can adjust the occurrence of the topics you are interested in.
